title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group

gold: This chart shows that people aged 25 - 44 are spending the least amount of minutes on social media , at just under 80 minutes per day . \\n \\n Whereas those aged 45 - 54 are spending the most time on social media at 150 minutes per day .
